about_the_game:
About game

Play with 4-10 player online but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone!

About game

Imagine being an astronaut. You have been sent with a grup of people into the space. When you finally reach the space station you are told to take care of the station. Unfortunately not everyone have good intentions. It occurs that there is a killer inside the station. Your job is to find out who the killer is while taking care of the station. But watch out: the killer can come out of nowhere when you won't be prepared. You shouldn't look for friends at the station - you don't know who the betrayer is. When you'll finally find out the killer don't be kind to him. Unconscionably kick him out of the station and save as many living souls as possible


Play as crewmate

If you are crew find who is the impostor or fill the task bar to win

Play as Impostor

If you are an Impostor make sabotages and kill the crew to win game,

Features

  • Customization

  • Lots of game options
  • Quickly find a game online
  • In-game text chat
  • In-game voice chat

name: Killer Inside Us

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: This game is available to play online with your friends (4-10 people). Inside the station there are killers and crewmates. The job of the killers is to kill the crewmates and don't get caught. They also can sabotage the station by disturbing the work of the space station.
supported_languages:
English*, Turkish*, Russian*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support
